info.title: Portal Network JSON-RPC Specification
info.description: A specification of the standard interface for Portal Network clients.

methods.name: discv5_nodeInfo
methods.summary: Returns ENR and nodeId information of the local discv5 node.

schema.title: nodeInfoResults
schema.description: ENR and NodeId of the local peer

enr.title: nodeENR
enr.description: URL-safe base64 encoded \"text\" version of the ENR prefixed by \"enr:\"."

nodeId.title: nodeId
nodeId.description: Hex encoded `NodeId` of an ENR (a 32 byte identifier).

methods.name: discv5_updateNodeInfo
methods.summary: Add, update, or remove a key-value pair from the local node record

schema.title: nodeInfoResults
schema.description: ENR and NodeId of the local peer

enr.title: nodeENR
enr.description: URL-safe base64 encoded \"text\" version of the ENR prefixed by \"enr:\"."

localNodeId.title: nodeId
localNodeId.description: Hex encoded `NodeId` of an ENR (a 32 byte identifier).

methods.name: discv5_routingTableInfo
methods.summary: Returns meta information about discv5 routing table.

methods.name: discv5_addEnr
methods.summary: Write an ethereum node record to the routing table.

methods.name: discv5_getEnr
methods.summary: Fetch from the local node the latest ENR associated with the given NodeId

methods.name: discv5_deleteEnr
methods.summary: Delete a Node ID from the routing table

methods.name: discv5_lookupEnr
methods.summary: Fetch from the DHT the latest ENR associated with the given NodeId

methods.name: discv5_ping
methods.summary: Send a PING message to the designated node and wait for a PONG response.

recipientIP.description: IP address of the intended recipient

methods.name: discv5_findNode
methods.summary: Send a FINDNODE request for nodes that fall within the given set of distances, to the designated peer and wait for a response.

methods.name: discv5_talkReq
methods.summary: Send a TALKREQ request with a payload to a given peer and wait for response.

result.name: talkResult
result.description: Returns TALKRESP message as hex string

methods.name: discv5_recursiveFindNodes
methods.summary: Look up ENRs closest to the given target

methods.name: portal_historyRoutingTableInfo
methods.summary: Returns meta information about history network routing table.

methods.name: portal_historyAddEnr
methods.summary: Write an ethereum node record to the routing table.

methods.name: portal_historyGetEnr
methods.summary: Fetch from the local node the latest ENR associated with the given NodeId

methods.name: portal_historyDeleteEnr
methods.summary: Delete a Node ID from the routing table

methods.name: portal_historyLookupEnr
methods.summary: Fetch from the DHT the latest ENR associated with the given NodeId

methods.name: portal_historyPing
methods.summary: Send a PING message to the designated node and wait for a PONG response.

methods.name: portal_historyFindNodes
methods.summary: Send a FINDNODES request for nodes that fall within the given set of distances, to the designated peer and wait for a response.

methods.name: portal_historyFindContent
methods.summary: Send FINDCONTENT message to get the content with a content key.

methods.name: portal_historyOffer
methods.summary: Send an OFFER request with given ContentKey, to the designated peer and wait for a response.

methods.name: portal_historyRecursiveFindNodes
methods.summary: Look up ENRs closest to the given target, that are members of the history network

methods.name: portal_historyRecursiveFindContent
methods.summary: Look up a target content key in the network

methods.name: portal_historyTraceRecursiveFindContent
methods.summary: Look up a target content key in the network and get tracing data

methods.name: portal_historyStore
methods.summary: Store history content key with content data

methods.name: portal_historyLocalContent
methods.summary: Get a content from the local database

methods.name: portal_historyGossip
methods.summary: Send the provided content item to interested peers. Clients may choose to send to some or all peers.

methods.name: portal_stateRoutingTableInfo
methods.summary: Returns meta information about state network routing table.

methods.name: portal_stateAddEnr
methods.summary: Write an ethereum node record to the routing table.

methods.name: portal_stateGetEnr
methods.summary: Fetch from the local node the latest ENR associated with the given NodeId

methods.name: portal_stateDeleteEnr
methods.summary: Delete a Node ID from the routing table

methods.name: portal_stateLookupEnr
methods.summary: Fetch from the DHT the latest ENR associated with the given NodeId

methods.name: portal_statePing
methods.summary: Send a PING message to the designated node and wait for a PONG response.

methods.name: portal_stateFindNodes
methods.summary: Send a FINDNODES request for nodes that fall within the given set of distances, to the designated peer and wait for a response.

methods.name: portal_stateFindContent
methods.summary: Send FINDCONTENT message to get the content with a content key.

methods.name: portal_stateOffer
methods.summary: Send an OFFER request with given ContentKey, to the designated peer and wait for a response.

methods.name: portal_stateRecursiveFindNodes
methods.summary: Look up ENRs closest to the given target, that are members of the state network

methods.name: portal_stateRecursiveFindContent
methods.summary: Look up a target content key in the network

methods.name: portal_stateStore
methods.summary: Store state content key with content data

methods.name: portal_stateLocalContent
methods.summary: Get a content from the local database

methods.name: portal_stateGossip
methods.summary: Send the provided content item to interested peers. Clients may choose to send to some or all peers.

ProtocolId.name: protocolId
ProtocolId.description: The protocol element of discv5 TALKREQ message-data

TalkReqPayload.name: talkReqPayload
TalkReqPayload.description: The request element of discv5 TALKREQ message-data

AddEnrResult.name: addEnrResult
AddEnrResult.description: Returns boolean if the node record has been successfully saved.

DeleteEnrResult.name: deleteEnrResult
DeleteEnrResult.description: Returns boolean upon successful deletion of the node record.

FindContentResult.name: FindContentResult
FindContentResult.description: Returns either the requested content, received directly from the CONTENT message or transferred over uTP, or, in case the recipient does not have the content, a list of ENR records of nodes that are closer than the recipient is to the requested content.

utpTransfer.description: Indicates whether the content was transferred over a uTP connection or not.

oneOf.title: ENRs
oneOf.description: List of ENR records of nodes that are closer than the recipient is to the requested content

FindNodeResult.name: findNodeResult
FindNodeResult.description: Returns nodes in a given distance

GetEnrResult.name: getEnrResult
GetEnrResult.description: Returns latest ENR associated with the given node ID.

LookupEnrResult.name: lookupEnrResult
LookupEnrResult.description: Returns ENR associated with the given node ID

OfferResult.name: offerResult
OfferResult.description: Returns the content keys bitlist upon successful content transmission or empty bitlist receival

RecursiveFindNodesResult.name: recursiveFindNodesResult
RecursiveFindNodesResult.description: Up to 16 ENRs of the closest nodes, sorted by distance.

localNodeId.title: nodeId
localNodeId.description: The key identifying the local peer that owns the routing table.

RecursiveFindContentResult.name: RecursiveFindContentResult
RecursiveFindContentResult.description: Returns the hex encoded content value and utp transfer flag. If the content is not available, returns "0x"

utpTransfer.description: Indicates whether the content was transferred over a uTP connection or not.

TraceRecursiveFindContentResult.name: TraceRecursiveFindContentResult
TraceRecursiveFindContentResult.description: Returns the hex encoded content value and trace data object. If the content is not available, returns "0x"

utpTransfer.description: Indicates whether the content was transferred over a uTP connection or not.

trace.description: Contains trace data for the request.

LocalContentResult.name: LocalContentResult
LocalContentResult.description: Returns the hex encoded content value. If the content is not available, returns "0x"

GossipResult.name: gossipResult
GossipResult.description: Returns the number of peers that the content was gossiped to

ContentNotFoundError.message: RecursiveFindContent failed: Unable to locate content on the network.

kBucket.title: kBucket info
kBucket.description: List of up to 16 hex encoded nodeIds, ordered from least-recently connected to most-recently connected.

kBuckets.title: kBuckets
kBuckets.description: The buckets comprising the routing table.

DataRadius.title: Data radius as a hex encoded uint256

traceResultObject.title: traceResultObject
traceResultObject.description: Trace data for the result of tracing content request.

receivedFrom.description: Node ID from which the content was received.

startedAtMs.description: Timestamp of the beginning of this request in milliseconds.

cancelled.description: List of node IDs requests to which were sent but cancelled due to receiving content from somewhere else, before receiving response from those nodes.

traceResultResponses.title: traceResultResponses
traceResultResponses.description: Contains a map of remote node IDs with the node IDs each node responded with. For the node ID that is in the `receivedFrom` field, `respondedWith` MUST be empty array.

traceResultResponseItem.title: traceResultResponseItem
traceResultResponseItem.description: Contains the node's response, including the duration of the request.

durationsMs.description: Time it took from the beginning of the lookup(JSON-RPC request) up to receiving this response.

traceResultMetadata.title: traceResultMetadata
traceResultMetadata.description: Contains a map from node ID to the metadata object for that node.

traceResultMetadataObject.title: traceResultMetadataObject
traceResultMetadataObject.description: Contains metadata for each node ID mentioned in the trace response.
